comments:
Add a file (in the sample: "testfile.xml" in an EAR app "Message" with ejb and app client module) to the ear app at "Message\EarContent". Publish to server (JBoss 4.0, running all the time). Then delete the file and republish.
This message occurs: 
"Publishing failed
  Publish failed using Ant publisher
    Resource /Message/EarContent/testfile.xml does not exist."

Solution: restart eclipse.

I think this is a duplicate but I am not sure Tim passing to you.

This appears to be a duplicate of a bug that was causing server state to be lost during restart. Once you move up to a recent build (e.g. this week's M-build) please remove the app from the server, publish, and then add it back. If you still see the problem, please reopen.

Works now.

Thanks for fixing it !
